text:
An Indian sailor, taken hostage by pirates nearly a month-and-a-half ago, has been “rescued”, External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj said on Sunday.

“I am happy to inform the rescue of the 11th sailor Capt Rohan Ruparelia,” Ms. Swaraj tweeted.

Capt. Ruparelia was taken hostage after his ship Maximus with 10 other Indians on board was seized by pirates off the Ivory Coast on February 11. While 10 Indian crew members were rescued by the Nigerian Navy on February 19, Capt. Ruparelia was taken captive. — PTI

Capt. Ruparelia was taken hostage after his ship with 10 others on board seized by pirates
title: Indian freed from pirates
